thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Heron Therapeutics Says Enrollment Complete In Both Pivotal Phase 3 Studies For Htx-011

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Heron Therapeutics Says Enrollment Complete In Both Pivotal Phase 3 Studies For Htx-011

organizations.name: brief-heron therapeutics says enrollment complete in both pivotal phase

text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Heron Therapeutics Inc:
* HERON THERAPEUTICS - ENROLLMENT COMPLETE IN BOTH PIVOTAL PHASE 3 STUDIES FOR HTX-011; TOP-LINE RESULTS EXPECTED IN H1 OF 2018
* HERON THERAPEUTICS INC - FOR PHASE 3 EFFICACY STUDIES IN BUNIONECTOMY AND HERNIA REPAIR, EXPECTS TO FILE AN NDA WITH FDA IN H2 OF 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
